summary: A sexy black nurse takes vigilante justice against inner-city drug dealers after her sister becomes their latest victim.
cast: Pam Grier|Booker Bradshaw|Robert DoQui|William Elliott|Allan Arbus|Sid Haig|Barry Cahill|Lee de Broux|Ruben Moreno|Lisa Farringer|Carol Locatell|Linda Haynes|John Perak|Mwako Cumbuka|Morris Buchanan|Peaches Jones|Jan-Minika Hughes|Leslie McRay|Ray Young|Bob Minor|Jeff Burton|Wally Strauss|Dick O'Shea|Kim Williams|Ellen Blake|Lee Terry|Gail Davis|Lyman Ward|Don Newsome|Karen Williams|Bobby Johnson|Ron Gans|Nat Jones|Dea St. Lamont|Bebe Louie|Jason Laskay|Walter Beakel|Eumenio Blanco|Calvin Brown|Edward Coch Jr.|Gwen Farrell|Eugene Jackson|Marilyn Joi|Paul King|Hans Moebus|Anthony Redondo|Cosmo Sardo
title: Coffy
